meanings.definition: A note at the bottom of a page that provides additional information or citations.
meanings.sent1: In the book, the author included footnoting to explain complex terms.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often rely on footnoting to support their research findings.
meanings.sent3: The footnoting in the textbook made the students giggle with its quirky comments.
meanings.sent4: Her footnoting was like a treasure hunt, leading readers to hidden gems of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The footnoting was like a secret code, unlocking the mysteries of the text.

meanings.definition: To add a footnote to a document or text.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours footnoting her research paper to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: When writing a thesis, it is important to practice footnoting correctly.
meanings.sent3: He footnoted his grocery list, jokingly citing the importance of snacks.
meanings.sent4: Footnoting his speech with personal anecdotes made it more engaging.
meanings.sent5: The author excelled at footnoting, seamlessly integrating sources into the text.
